column5: Our apartment is centrally located in the popular, historic Houston Heights. We are minutes from NRG stadium, museum district, Galleria, Midtown and downtown. Great restaurants, bars, and coffee shops within walking distance (check out reviews from our guests)! Private entrance. You're welcome to use the backyard pool. Kitchen has all cooking essentials including beverages, coffee, and basic breakfast items. Perfect for business travelers, couples or a friends weekend!
column8: Private poolside apt in Heights/5 min to downtown
